skill_e.tooltip:

Active: Mordekaiser pulls enemies in the chosen area dealing ? magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and movement speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions.

skill_q.tooltip: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with Nightfall dealing ? magic damage to all enemies in the area, increased by ?% if it hits only a single enemy.

skill_r.tooltip:
Mordekaiser banishes a target to the Death Realm with him for ?s, stealing ?% of their core stats for the duration.

If Mordekaiser kills his target in the Death Realm he consumes their soul, keeping the stats he stole until the target respawns.

skill_w.tooltip:

Indestructible grants him the shield and may be cast a second time to consume it, healing for ?% of the remaining value.
